mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKES WHERE MEMNUM=#{memNum} AND CLASSNUM=#{classNum}
mapper.select: SELECT X.CLASSNUM AS CLASSNUM, INSTRUCTOR, TITLE, PRIMARYCATEGORY, PRICE, Y.EMAIL, Y.PROFILEPIC, X.STARTDATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY STARTDATE) AS RNUM, CLASSNUM, INSTRUCTOR, TITLE, PRIMARYCATEGORY, PRICE, MASTERNUM, STARTDATE FROM ONEDAYCLASS WHERE CLASSNUM IN (SELECT CLASSNUM FROM LIKES WHERE MEMNUM=#{memNum})) X, ACLAPMEMBER Y WHERE Y.MEMNUM IN X.MASTERNUM AND X.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY RNUM
